page.title: 10 Children at Play
page.content: Attleborough First School is for children between the ages of 4 and 8. At this time there are 302 pupils an the school.Each of the children was asked to state their favourite T.V programme,their favourite playground game and typical activities undertaken on a Sunday.Collecting the result together a "Top Ten" was formed for each of the 3 mentioned catergories. FAVOURITE T.V. PROGRAMME Position Programme Votes 1 HE-MAN 13 1 RAINBOW 13 3 TOM&JERRY 12 4 MICKEY MOUSE 10 4 THE A TEAM 10 6 STREETHAWK 09 7 THE BISKITTS 08 8 KNIGHT RIDER 06 8 POSTMAN PAT 06 8 INCREDIBLE HULK 06
